grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 漸減【ゼンゲン】gradual decrease, decline
kun reading compounds: 漸く【ようやく】finally, at last, barely, narrowly, hardly, only just, gradually, little by little, by degrees
稍【やや】a little, partially, somewhat, slightly, semi-, -ish, on the ... side, a short time, a while
漸う【ようよう】finally, barely, only just, gradually
